divs: Sighting Detailsplease do not think im crazy but i see them EVERY night. I have hours of footage but my cam corder is not that new so its not that great but good. but I know these objects going down behind houses,going straight down,side ways, and right angles is not normal. I can show you. preferable someone who really has not been in the spot light. I am starting to be scared for my family because they have not tried to communicate and weird things are happening to us. By every morning there are several directly above my home.I can explain more privately. Im not sure if this is the right thing to do my son says not to contact anyone, hes scared we are all just unsure. Also above is not my real name
Object Shape: Cone, Circle, Disc, Flash, Sphere, Triangle
